website_summaries.verdict: This premium mixed media box set is ideal for adventurous artists who enjoy experimenting with a variety of styles. Beautifully packaged with an incredible array of artistic tools.
pros: Jam-packed with everything you need to create your next masterpiece
Allows users to broaden their artistic horizons with an eclectic mix of acrylic, oil, and watercolor paints
Includes an impressive selection of watercolor pencils, oil pastels, soft pastels, and even a graphite pencil for those first outlines
Fully equipped with everything from brushes and pallets, to canvas boards and palette knives
Sturdy case is great for on-the-go use
cons: If your preferred medium is charcoal, graphite, or pen, this set probably isn’t for you

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Every time I get this set out I remember how glad I am that I bought it! I wasn’t sure if I should at first; there were a lot of comments saying how messy it was when it arrived, and how it wasn’t packaged well which caused parts to break. Thankfully that was not the case for me at all! It shipped very quickly and when I opened it everything was wrapped in plastic- no flying pastels or messes anywhere! There were no broken parts, scratches, or missing pieces, just beautiful paints and tools. :) I still can’t believe what a good price it was too, it comes with so much. I definitely would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: alyssa

customer_reviews.title: So sad, easel case was trashed!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, ordered this for my teen’s birthday gift. The packaging was great, she was so excited when she saw the box of what was inside. There, the excitement ended. The easel case was broken apart into so many pieces! Even the parts that were not broken, were clearly not built well! We are initiating the return now, and will not be getting this item as a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Ackmhutto

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product. It's useless.
customer_reviews.text: This product is awful. It is old and the acrylics are so old that they are completely useless. Huge disappointment. Had to go to the local art store and buy a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Made
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this item for our daughter for a gift and we could not open the lower drawer at all - would not budge. We returned it and ordered a replacement. The replacement lower drawer was VERY difficult to open and there was no way anyone but a grown adult could open it. The construction was either poorly done or did not allow for natural particle board absorption of moisture. Additionally, the otter case wood was cracked in two places. Not a quality item. Returning the replacement and will look elsewhere for our art supply needs.
customer_reviews.author: Erick W. Sweet II

customer_reviews.title: Great except for the broken pastels :(
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my son’s girlfriend. She loves all things art and was super excited About this but as she was going through everything I noticed the pastels are all cracked up and broken. At $70 for this you would think that it would’ve been better packaged.
customer_reviews.author: B Back

customer_reviews.title: Best gift of ALL of the Christmas presents!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a surprise for my niece. I was worried because she had a ton of "art sets" but I figured with her talent, we might as well get her something useful. The look on her face was priceless! She never had such a nice complete set like this! My favorite part would have to be the watercolor pencils! She has already made me a bunch of masterpieces! If you are an aspiring artist looking to learn new mediums I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS!!!! Or, if you are looking to foster a love of art for someone close to you, I feel this is a must have! This was most definitely the best purchase I have made all 2016!
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but not the quality box you might be expecting
customer_reviews.text: The art products inside are quite decent, and the variety is nice. However, the box is not as well-made as I had been led to believe. The wood is very thin and somewhat rough. The latch hardware is solid and seems like it will hold up, but the rubber feet started coming off within a few hours of use, leaving the box to rest on exposed screws sticking out several millimeters from the bottom of the box.
customer_reviews.author: James Renatus

customer_reviews.title: Crap - You will be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter's 14th birthday. The drawers had to be sanded down with a dremel because they would stick pushing in and pulling. I don't mean a little stuck, I mean having to pry it open with a screwdriver. Then my daughter goesto use the paints and so far hzlf of them are completely dried out, or almost, but unusable either way. The black acrylic tube was completely exploded and was basically a big ball of rubber. Needless to say, I am completely embarrassed as a father and disappointed as a consumer. Do I want a refund? Of course. Do I want to deal with the hassle of a return, absolutely not.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Should be cheaper but a decent package of items.
customer_reviews.text: Paint wasn’t dried out like other have received. I wish I got extra acrylic or water color paint instead of oil paint because I’m not sure how to use oil paints. I have yet to use the spatulas because they don’t seem as accurate or durable. The colored pencils are not as pigmented as I wish they were. Paint brushes aren’t the best quality but they have given me some great pieces of work. I wouldn’t say it worth nearly $80, maybe $60. Overall I have got some great pieces of work out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: For any young person who loves art.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a into art. For her big Christmas gift from us was this All artist box. It contains all types of mediums for her to choose from. This has been such a great gift for her. she has already painted several canvases. She loves to draw with the colored pencils and the markers are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Pitt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal, fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal! 5 days into "social distancing" and my teen daughter was already driving me nuts telling me she's bored 15x a day.. This came super fast, despite the pandemic, and includes a bunch of supplies. Added a couple pads of decent sized paper n can already tell this purchase is going to be a lifesaver around MY home.
customer_reviews.author: MzMarley319

customer_reviews.title: Malfunction
customer_reviews.text: My the drawers were glued in. We tried everything to get them out. Very frustrating. We submitted for a return, hopefully everything goes through correctly. UPDATE: Still no refund. Overall, i would just go with a different seller because this has been a headache!
customer_reviews.author: Sarahanne

customer_reviews.title: Broken and poorly fit together
customer_reviews.text: the wooden easel was broken - the top cover was completely cracked off, the latches that are supposed to keep the drawers from sliding out were placed close enough that the latch didn't actually latch anything tight, the pastels were cracked, and there was pastel dust/debri everywhere inside.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D.

customer_reviews.title: Great for budding artists
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old is showing great interest in painting and drawing, and he was very excited to receive this for Christmas. He is already painting and says it's "perfect." The paint looks to be a good quality, and the amount of supplies it came with is impressive. The easel is sturdy and already being put to good use.
customer_reviews.author: Andi (Ann Santulli)

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set I bought it as a birthday gift for my 9 year old daughter and I couldn't be more pleased it is heavy wooden boxed with pull out trays and all kinds of mixed mediums to work with I love that it has latches for the pull out trays as well as for the top. great handle and good hardware. she will get allot of use out of this. love it!
customer_reviews.author: KarlaC

customer_reviews.title: Cool, preused kit
customer_reviews.text: Good kit but when it was opened up (as a gift) there were 5 of the acrylic paints was opened and previously used as were the: pastels, oils, water colors... Well half the kit was, including eraser. Half the brushes have used paint on them. Would have given it 5 stars otherwise. The box is great and why I bought the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Smith

customer_reviews.title: It's sad because the kit itself was nice
customer_reviews.text: The oil pains seem old and the watercolor colored pencil's lead just fall apart. When you try to sharpen the pencil the lead just quickly breaks. I tried to deal with the place that sold the items but they were unwilling to offer any help. It's sad because the kit itself was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Christmas present for my 14 year old daughter who loves painting, drawing, etc. SHE LOVES IT! She uses it all the time and has created some great paintings with it. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Vacc

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner set; a step up from “kids” painting sets
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this purchase for my 11 year old who was looking for something more ‘advanced’ than a kids painting set but is still a beginner. Gives her a chance to try out lots of different mediums (oil, watercolor, acrylic). Felt it was a bit pricey but it’s well made and comes with everything you need to get started. Love how it is all contained within the drawers and can be easily packed up. Overall a great beginner set that makes her feel like she has ‘real’ art supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea10011

customer_reviews.title: Art box
customer_reviews.text: The bottom drawer does not work couldn't get it open and then when we did we cant get it back in. There is a tiny lip where they put 2 different pieces of wood together that does not allow it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle McGee

customer_reviews.title: Broken lock, otherwise nice enough
customer_reviews.text: Everything looks great, except that one of the side locks arrived comepletely broken. It won't lock, meaning the drawer doesn't stay in when the box is transported. Bummed out about that, and also the box looks kind of weathered like it's been used. Otherwise the supplies look nice and the box is solid.
customer_reviews.author: S Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Looks like they fixed problems
customer_reviews.text: Read other reviews saying not packaged well, broken pieces pastels etc but set came well packaged. Looks like they fixed problems. Has a little bit of everything and my sister (gift) loved it. The paints were a good quality (other reviews said they were old and dried out). The brushes were of good quality as well. Used acrylic and watercolors so far and they were great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy for my little Picasso. All of the water color chalk was broken., other than that it is a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chad McMullen

customer_reviews.title: GREAT kit!
customer_reviews.text: this is actually a very nice art set. my daughter is in no way a beginner & she still loved it, and still uses it! The case is made a very strong & durable wood. It’s really a GREAT kit for the money!
customer_reviews.author: kim somewhere in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Nice little set for someone who wants to get into painting.
customer_reviews.text: I'm just starting in painting and I love this kit. It doesn't have much of each color, but it's a good starter. With it, I also purchased a pack of Acrylic paper, watercolor paper and canvas. I also purchased some sponges and a texture medium. I've only used the acrylic paint so far. The tripod can be a little confusing to figure out how it goes together, but I looked up a Youtube video of how to do it. Basically, it goes on the top of the box, not the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Packaged well!
customer_reviews.text: Some reviewers had problems with how it was shipped but it looks like that has improved. Mine arrived carefully packaged and inside the supplies were shrink wrapped in trays so everything was in place and nice and clean. I love it's portability and it's a cool variety of supplies.
customer_reviews.author: A. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Everything a beginner needs
customer_reviews.text: I love this item, i just wanted an aisle but i got so much more. from the pencils to the pastels to the mini canvases. worth the $70+dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Kr9295

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my granddaughter for Christmas. It was the only thing on her list. When she started opening it, she had a smile that could light the world. That quickly faded. The fronts of the drawers were not attatched. There are little nails on the drawer and dried glue on the back of the cover. I was absolutely horrified! This is going back!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy L.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set... just what I was looking for. Oils, watercolors, acrylics, pastels, colored pencils, sketching pencils, plus canvas and paper. Brushes for each medium and pallets for both watercolor and oils. Built in easel is a nice touch and I find the box plenty sturdy with very nice latches. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Great for personal or gift.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the beginning or occasional artist. Has everything a person needs to produce art. Contains multiple media.
customer_reviews.author: William Butler

customer_reviews.title: Dry acrylic paint will not thin out.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this but the acrylic paint is lumpy and would not squeeze out of the tube. It came out the back in a lump and would not mix with water. I tried several tubes they were all the same. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: its very nice
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift. First is has lots of colors each drawer to full of colors, brushes, pencils just alot. It comes with a couple packs of drawing paper. The box is great imo it is natural and it is not a flimsy box by any means. I like the natural finish because the recipient can customize the box themselves making it unique. I got this on a lightening deal 47 bux with prime shipping. It's a deal for all that you are getting.
customer_reviews.author: alina martinez

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: This is really neat. If you're looking to buy something artistic for an artistic friend or loved one this would be great. It's a nifty little case and has drawers to keep the various items in. I love that the lid can lift and with a quick twist of a butterfly be turned into an easel. I got this for a friend who loves to paint and sketch and she loves it. I want one myself, but I can't draw. Like, I draw so bad that your stick figures probably look like the Mona Lisa compared to mine. ...but I still want one. I just may get one!
customer_reviews.author: Sad Panda 1980

customer_reviews.title: Great art set for kids
customer_reviews.text: Had to send one back due to drawer not opening. Either from moisture or over varnishing the drawers may not open. Otherwise a great art gift for kids
customer_reviews.author: M. Long

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: This product had a defect and I wrote the company and no response.
customer_reviews.author: paula hancock

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set!
customer_reviews.text: Very comprehensive art set. May be a bit much for a beginner, but it's a perfect gift for any artist.
customer_reviews.author: Thatcher Stevens

customer_reviews.title: An Artist Must have
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my son whose an Artist. He normally does his artwork at home but with this, he carries it with him everywhere he goes. He said it's the perfect gift because one never knows when you'll be inspired by something and I agree. He art is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: a little glue and it is ALL good. Lots of good stuff in this box
customer_reviews.text: This box was packed very well with no spillage of paint whatsoever. I was a little concerned after reading the reviews. The only thing that was wrong was one if the drawer fronts had come unglued from the drawer itself....a little glue and it is ALL good. Lots of good stuff in this box. I can't wait to get started using it! *Update. I went to use the acrylic colors last night and they are all dried up. Disappointing for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Purdy

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kid's Christmas gift. Bought it a few months ago. When the box was opened first time today, two drawer fronts were broken off. They are just pressed paper that was holding them together. everything else seems to be in order. But the kit become unusable. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: cookiemonster

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my daughter. She loves it and she share the set with her little brother.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Set for the Art Hobbyist
customer_reviews.text: This set has all the most common means of creating art objects such as oil paints, acrylics, charcoal, colored crayons, pencils, etc. I found the selection of materials to be excellent. There is one star missing, and that is because when the set was delivered, the wrapping was loose and some of the things were out of place. It's like somebody opened it, peeked in it and closed it up half-way really quick. The wrapping should be the next point of concentration for this company. Otherwise, I highly recommend this art set.
customer_reviews.author: JK8

customer_reviews.title: Think twice before ordering this product!!
customer_reviews.text: The wooden case/easel was broken when it arrived. Cracked so badly I could see daylight through the lid. It had to have been dropped at the shipping warehouse or the delivery person or wherever. The case was marred, and consequently askew, and that would not allow for the closures to work. The photo is how I found the pastels when I opened them ... There weren't even screws to do the minor assembly needed to USE it as an easel. SIGH!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply constructed box.
customer_reviews.text: Gifted to my grand daughter. A drawer fell apart upon opening. Very cheap cardboard like material. Good selection of colors, but missing essential mixers ( turpentine etc.) for oils. No instructions. Could do better buying separately at an art store.
customer_reviews.author: Maria A. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great quality products and the kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality products and you get a lot for your money. All different kinds of art materials & the kids loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came shipped nice easily put together but came missing a paintbrush and ...
customer_reviews.text: Came shipped nice easily put together but came missing a paintbrush and a couple paintbrushes felt like the bristles had been glued.
customer_reviews.author: melinda

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Art Kit
customer_reviews.text: The easel is a very nice feature. Great travel case when you want to do your art on the go. So many supplies all in one kit.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: She loved it
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter who is a budding artist. She loved it & it is so practical.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Liz Cuttino

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 12 year old and she loves it!!!! Easily folds up, keeps everything tidy, great for road trips, vacations, family functions, you name it! Fabulous variations of materials to draw, write, paint with. (I don't know the proper wording)
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for an inspiring artist
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for an inspiring artist. I make greeting cards and it is wonderful having all of my paints, pastels, pencils in one place. I love the built in easel doesn't take up a lot of space and can easily put away at the end of a project.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little set for for my daughter who aspires to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great little set for for my daughter who aspires to be an artist. Broad enough for her to have a chance to try her hand at oils/acrylics. Only down side is some of the pieces have dried and cracked or dried out completely.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Oertel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Beginner Paint Set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 yr old daughter and she absolutely LOVES it! Yes the brushes are not the best, but they are very useable. The price was much cheaper shipped to my door than I could find anything similar at the store. It doesn't have alot of supplies but its designed to be completely portable and its very much a 5 star purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: not made correctly
customer_reviews.text: Overall seems like a good product but have to give it only One Star because the box was manufactured wrong. It did not have the slots on the side of the lid so you can turn the top into and easel. I contacted Amazon and they issued me a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loved this! i gave this to her for christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: Best little artist set ever
customer_reviews.text: Best little artist set ever. My daughter loves this kit. Doesn't want anything newer or bigger to grow with her for now. After two years she Institute on buying little tunes of paint and things that will fit in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Daniele V Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: and it gave her a large base of mediums to try that she was not sure about purchasing separately and expanded her basic pencil/c
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my daughter, and it gave her a large base of mediums to try that she was not sure about purchasing separately and expanded her basic pencil/colored and easy to tote and store. Very happy with look, function and contents.
customer_reviews.author: Julie C.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value very usable and supplies are perfect for beginners and beyond Liked it so much bought another ad a gift for a family member,
customer_reviews.author: Gary C. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Good product great value
customer_reviews.text: This was my grand daughters favorite gift this year. A good starter kit
customer_reviews.author: Kent  Musser

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Value
customer_reviews.text: This art kit is far more advanced than the Art 101 kits. I bought this for my youngest daughter and she has created some beautiful arcrilic paintings. She has drawn some amazing horses and used the colored pencils to color them. This art kit has everything but the how to drawing books, how to painting books and the imagination to get started in art.
customer_reviews.author: T. M. Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Not horrible but wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: Many broken pieces and cheap wood box. However sample sizes gives you a good selection to mess around with. Having said that I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: lyrah

customer_reviews.title: Everything inside
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, everything was inside, bought as a gift for my sis. She love it, a bit heavy but amazing
customer_reviews.author: cristy mejia

customer_reviews.title: The drawer is stuck closed
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my granddaughter for Christmas. The bottom drawer is stuck shut.
customer_reviews.author: Becky G.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to a semi-retired artist when the pandemic first started and it kept her entertained. Great for someone who wants to get back into things, but needs all the basic tools.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great art kit. It comes with everything you need to get started.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: works great for my 8 year old!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forr a paint set that was great for beginners and older children but not cheap or a "toy"..so I took a chance and purchased this for my 8 year old daughter and she loves it...everything arrived in excellent shape...no broken paint tubes or any other issues...easel was super easy to set up and works great too! The case is heavy but that is to be expected...very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter will love this gift
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter will love this gift. I chose it for the variety of mediums it had and the built in easel.
customer_reviews.author: lynnembw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For my daughter, she loves it with all the options to express herself.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Tribble

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe how great this set is
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how great this set is. SO many mediums, and the wood case is well made and will last forever. My niece was thrilled with the gift, she said it was the best Christmas gift she got this past year!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is so not worth the money! Kit arrived with dried out paints and broken pastels. Even the items that arrived undamaged are not of very good quality
customer_reviews.author: nicholas guzman

customer_reviews.title: All looks in good condition. Have not used it yet
customer_reviews.text: All looks in good condition. Have not used it yet. 2 of the side latches were bent and not holding drawers in place. Tried to bend them in position, so they will hold drawers, did not break off, as i feared they might. Do not know if they will hold, but will keep it and try.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph T. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Everything you expect.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for my college age daughter and her high school age brother over Christmas. It really was packed with lots of great art supplies and my daughter got into it and started painting right away. Bonus for me, I now have a new piece of art.
customer_reviews.author: cassy king

customer_reviews.title: Let my daughter down
customer_reviews.text: This waa bought this for my daughter's birthdy. It is cheaply made, and arrived damaged. Drawer was delaminated, and chalks were all shattered. I think there are better kits out there. I'm surprised it's this highly rated.
customer_reviews.author: Zak Dunne

customer_reviews.title: acrylic paints gone bad.
customer_reviews.text: the kit was a gift to my nephew and everything was to his liking except for all the acrylic paint being bad and I want to know if there is a way to replace them from the vendor. we don't want to return it just need good replacements for the acrylic paints
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All in one
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I brought this as a Christmas present for my daughter and she will love it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Peter Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The product is excellent. In stores, the cost of the box alone is more than this whole set. It would have been nice to have some directions. What product to use to clean the paints, how to clean the wooden palette, how to assemble the product, etc. we figured it out. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Merestwins43

customer_reviews.title: When you need something you can always get it from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Brought as a present for my granddaughter birthday she loves it comes with everything you need to learn how to paint.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit! Love the fact that it has three types of paint and colored pencils to try different styles.
customer_reviews.author: Rough Rider

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My niece LOVED this! Has lots of storage and easy to store away.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Great set with everything you need
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful full set with everything that you could possibly need. The wood box is very nice quality and the contents are full of variety. With oil, acrylic, watercolor, and all of the tools needed to get started. Great set for a great price. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: valleystationgirl

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas gift for my boyfriend and he lloooovveesss it!! If you have a family member/ friend that loves to draw/paint I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquemys

customer_reviews.title: ... quality and I would order this again and have recommended it to others
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter and she raves about the quality and I would order this again and have recommended it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Ron M

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great artist kit, has all you need to paint whatever you want..Watercolor, chalk, oil and acrylic...Very excited about this. Only one problem, the bottom drawer front is broken but still useable.. Highly recommend this if your serious about your art.
customer_reviews.author: Cari S Austin

customer_reviews.title: present
customer_reviews.text: I choose this as a present for my wife, she love it, it has an extensive colection of paints, oil, aquarela and pastel, pencils, brushes even paper!., the box is wood and it's drawers close perfectly for transportation. Excelent product!.
customer_reviews.author: Latis

customer_reviews.title: Good quality excellent gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave this art set to my older son for Christmas and he was awe struck. It will not disappoint and the quality of the actual supplies inside the box are excellent as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: The first day my daughter opened this, the wooden ...
customer_reviews.text: The first day my daughter opened this, the wooden handle broke and sharp nails are sticking out. When I took this out of the box, the product was very dusty. Screws barely worked when trying to assemble the rest of the peaces.
customer_reviews.author: Inna

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter took up painting and the set offers great assortment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything was quality. My granddaughter loves the royal and ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything was quality. My granddaughter loves the royal and Langnickel art set. The Castle art pencils were a gift so I don't know how to rate them.
customer_reviews.author: carol DeAdder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For my grand daughter’s birthday who labled it the best present ever. A great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Olson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. The only problem is that our box did not come with the pre-drilled holes on the case to attach the longer piece of wood on the outside with wingnuts. I hate to have to drill the holes myself. That is the only part we did not like. Bought this for my 10 old grandson and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dried out paints!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of the paints were dried out! And it took me a minute to access this so by the time I found out it was too late for me to return it!
customer_reviews.author: Jerrett Travis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit, latches don't latch from new but not the end of the world just have to be careful
customer_reviews.author: Always Growing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for someone for Christmas and I liked it so much I bought another one for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The product has a great variety of materials. They are pretty good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Jose

customer_reviews.title: he liked it! comes with everything you could think of ...
customer_reviews.text: bought it as a gift. was impressed with it. he liked it! comes with everything you could think of to start the young artist off!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Neuenschwander

customer_reviews.title: Great product - Awesome value!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! I definitely recommend for artists on the go. This was priced $40 under Aaron Brothers.
customer_reviews.author: BUmom10

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a Christmas gift for my future daughter in law. She loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very practicle
customer_reviews.text: This set has everything a beginner needs to get started. I bought this for my 8 year old as a X-mas gift. She abosolutely loved it. She got really good use out of it to make her Girl Scout Cookie sale sign. It was super bright and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Verushka0079

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift. She loved it. I thought it was a great carrying case and seemed to be built well. Can't comment on actual paint, etc.
customer_reviews.author: ang

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my daughter as a gift and was just what she wanted. Gets plenty of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: seaweed251

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed that straight out of the box it came damaged ...
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that straight out of the box it came damaged with with the little feet missing to prevent the box from slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Xmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set just from the pics on Amazon as a gift for my artistic grown son. He jumped for joy as it had every medium available in a beautifully organized wooden easel. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Linda in Jax, Florida

product_meta.title: Royal Langnickel - The All Media Easel Artist Set
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:1ROYAL LANGNICKEL-The All Media Easel Artist Set. This phenomenal kit includes everything you need to get started as an artist! Set includes twelve each of Essentials Oil Paints, Essentials Watercolor Paints, Essentials Acrylic Paints, Artist Oil Pastels, Watercolor Paper Sheets and Artist Paste, three each of White Bristle Brushes, Taklon Brushes, White Nylon Brushes and Plastic Palette Knives, two Canvas Boards and one each: Wooden Palette, Plastic six-well Palette, Drawing Pencil, Eraser, Pencil Sharpener and Artist Box Easel. Everything fits neatly into this wooden box for organized and compact storage. Box Measures: closed: 6-1/4x10-3/4x14-1/2 inches, open: Approximately 16 inches high. The lid and two Drawers securely latch closed. Imported.
feature_bullets: Royal Langnickel all media easel artist set is perfect for the avid artist, student, or traveling artist regardless of age or experience
Everything fits neatly into this wooden box for organized and compact storage
Kit includes 12 each of Oil Paints, Watercolor Paints, Acrylic Paints, Artist Oil Pastels, Watercolor Paper Sheets and Artist Paste and much more
Box Measures: closed: 6-1/4x10-3/4x14-1/2 inches, open: Approximately 16 inches high
Lid and two drawers securely latch closed
